ai-patthana8.26:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.26:1.1_0: for favourable thoughts, not with the cause.
ai-patthana8.26:1.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the sake of favour. The Teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause.
ai-patthana8.26:1.1_2: There are no cause or condition for the sake of favors, but not for the sake of passions.
ai-patthana8.26:2.1_0: There is no gain for fragrance, not for the sake of passion;
ai-patthana8.26:2.1_1: for fragrance, not for the sake of passion; for the sake of passion arises.
ai-patthana8.26:2.1_2: ties, etc., do not have causes and reasons.
ai-patthana8.26:3.1_0: There is no fragrance, not uninterest; for the sake of favourable, not with reason.
ai-patthana8.26:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the sake of fragrance ...
ai-patthana8.26:3.1_2: There are no fragrance, not carion, and there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.26:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
